item.title: Volcanic eruption begins in Iceland
item.description: The Blue Lagoon and the town of Grindavik were ordered to evacuate after earthquakes hit the area.

item.title: Mandalay was the 'city of gold' - now it reeks of death
item.description: Residents in Mandalay, Myanmar's second-largest city, speak of despair and sleepless nights since last week's earthquake.

item.title: Haiti gangs storm town and release 500 inmates from jail
item.description: Gangs control most of the capital but the attack seems to suggest they are expanding to other towns.

item.title: Election rumours swirl in Ukraine â€“ could Zelensky be mulling a summer poll?
item.description: A nationwide vote would be difficult, but some say there are good reasons to hold one soon.

item.title: Four killed in Israeli strike on Beirut, Lebanon says, despite ceasefire
item.description: The Israeli military said it targeted a Hezbollah operative in the southern suburbs of Lebanon's capital.
